Change Promotion Group

Use the Change Promotion Group dialog box (Actions | Promotion Group | Change) to change a promotion group assigned to one or more versioned files or projects, or to a project database if you've incorrectly assigned a promotion group or if you promoted to the next level by mistake.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Change From Select the name of the promotion group currently assigned to the selected files.
To Select the name of the new promotion group you want to assign to the files.
Include files in subprojects This field is available only when the selected item is a project or project database. Select to assign the new promotion group to all projects and files included in the project or project database.
Selected Files Tab
File list Review the selected files or projects to which you want to change the promotion group.
Properties button Click to display information on the item selected. You can view information on the item selected, including workspace settings and granted privileges.
